DOC.brief_summary: This proposal aim determine whether low alpha-2A-adrenoceptor agonist guanfacine improve deficit prefrontally-mediated cognitive function healthy elderly subject .
DOC.brief_title: Guanfacine Treatment Prefrontal Cognitive Dysfunction Elderly Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Primary : - To determine whether low Î±2A-adrenoceptor agonist guanfacine improve deficit prefrontally-mediated working memory executive control function , healthy elderly subject . Subjects randomly assign receive placebo guanfacine one two dose level : 0.1 mg , 0.5 mg daily bedtime double-blind fashion twelve week . Secondary : - To determine whether guanfacine favorably influence global status quality life ( QOL ) healthy elderly subject . - To determine whether low-dose guanfacine safe well-tolerated healthy elderly subject .
